verbs.description: [ARG0: The president ’s lawyer] [V: said] [ARG1: he understands Trump ’s frustration but Sessions’ recusal is defensible] .
The president ’s lawyer said [ARG0: he] [V: understands] [ARG1: Trump ’s frustration] but Sessions’ recusal is defensible .
The president ’s lawyer said he understands Trump ’s frustration but [ARG1: Sessions’ recusal] [V: is] [ARG2: defensible] .
